attributes.action: recomend to Parliament that the salaries of all MPs be reduced by 10% for one year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs of all parties should take a 10% reduction in salary for one year to acknowledge their share of blame for the financial crisis.  MPs sat back and allowed the bankers to wreck the economy and the lives of many people. They should share the pain.
